description: Describes the status of a topic refresh.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the topic whose refresh you want to describe.

parameters.name: TopicId
parameters.description: The ID of the topic that you want to describe. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: RefreshId
parameters.description: The ID of the refresh, which is performed when the topic is created or updated.

nested_items.name: RefreshDetails
nested_items.description: Details of the refresh, which is performed when the topic is created or updated.

nested_items.name: RefreshArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the topic refresh.

nested_items.name: RefreshId
nested_items.description: The ID of the refresh, which occurs as a result of topic creation or topic update.

nested_items.name: RefreshStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the refresh job that indicates whether the job is still running, completed successfully, or failed.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
